name: Shamrock
aura: Increases Ally ACC in all Battles by 70

skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 60% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target. If a buff is removed, has a 35% of stealing that buff.
Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies with more than 50% HP for 2 turns. Also has a 50% chance of placing a 30% [Increase C.RATE]
Places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Decreases the Turn Meter of all enemies by 15%. Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 15% if any enemyâ€™s Turn Meter is below 50%.
